description:
Epic Marble Shooter is a fun and addictive classic bubble shooter game based in the Egyptian pyramids.

Your objective is to aim, point and shoot at the similar colored marble bubble balls to create chain shooter combination reactions and eliminate the bubble chains using your bubble shooter gun.

Pop all the marbles on your screen to advance onto the next level. Maximize your score by shooting bubbles at different angles and make them rebound from the boundaries to increase the score in your bubble blasting journey!

Create chain shooter reactions of similar colored marble bubbles to get bonus scores and eliminate the whole bubble line to win big! Keep shooting, matching and popping the similar colored marble balls.
